children.subject: I didn't get a confirmation email after submitting the application. How do I know my app has been received properly?

history.content:
Stat 198's applications have opened! Applications are due 11:59 PM on Thursday, September 2. 

If you're curious about quant finance and have interests/experience in programming, data science, math, or statistics, apply to Traders at Berkeley's Intro to Quant finance Decal! This is a 2-unit course that teaches fundaments of capital markets, including topics from market microstructure to asset pricing. Students get to build predictive models and try out portfolio optimization techniques with python data science tools. The DeCal covers a broad set of topics and aims to reduce the barrier of entry into the field. Guest lectures will also be given from traders at Citadel, Optiver, and Headlands to provide perspectives into the industry. Finally, students will also get to develop and test their own trading strategies for a final project. We strongly recommend prerequisite python programming experience and a basic probability/statistics class too. Come to Traders at Berkeley's infosessions on Friday, 8/27 (online, 6-7:30) and Monday, 8/30 (Barrows 126 8-10pm), more details on our website at traders.berkeley.edu.
